subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych, the 12th seed, beat Novak Djokovic to advance to a Grand Slam final for the first time. He will face Rafael Nadal, who beat Andy Murray.
snippet: Tomas Berdych, the 12th seed, beat Novak Djokovic to advance to a Grand Slam final for the first time. He will face Rafael Nadal, who beat Andy Murray.
